name: GLADOM - the 2D moba in Pixel Art
name_original: GLADOM - the 2D moba in Pixel Art
description:
GLADOM is a MOBA in 2D pixel art style where opponents fight each other in teams of 4v4.
Competitiveness and game balance: They are the commitments we make with you, starting from your wish list, to your purchase, to the game, to your replay value.

  • Select your unique hero to fight in teams of 4v4 in a map which includes 3 lanes and a jungle full of neutral monsters. Stone minions will spawn to aid you in combat. Gain gold by last hitting minions to buy items to customize your build.
  • Improve your abilities every time you level up, one of them being the ultimate which is the most powerful ability.
  • Last hit your opponent's stone minions to gain gold.
  • Use your gold to buy items to strengthen yourself to kill opponents with ease.
  • Coordinate with your team to select a lane to fight, or roam the jungle to fight neutral monsters while helping your team mates by ganking lanes.
  • Kill enemy bosses to gain temporary buffs for you and your team that will make it easier to slay your opponents.
  • 10 Heroes will be included at release. New heroes will be added with constant development and support.

Ranked Leagues
There are 7 ranked leagues which you will be able to climb up based in your win rate.
(You can always opt for casual matches which doesn't count as ranked)


Hero Roster Reveal Dates
We will reveal each one of the 10 heroes that will be included at release, (starting with Arkhauld) until the release date.




Leveling Up
Each time you level up you can select 1 out of 4 abilities to improve. Ultimate ability can be leveled up at level 6, 12 and 18.
